mapper.sql: a.id, a.username, a.password, a.no, a.name, a.email, a.phone, a.mobile, a.user_type, a.photo, a.login_ip, a.login_date, a.login_flag, a.create_time, a.modify_time, a.remarks, a.del_flag

a.id, a.username AS "username", a.password, a.no, a.name, a.email, a.phone, a.mobile, a.user_type AS "userType", a.login_ip AS "loginIp", a.login_date AS "loginDate", a.remarks, a.login_flag AS "loginFlag", a.photo, a.create_time AS "createTime", a.modify_time AS "modifyTime", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO (username, password, no, name, email, phone, mobile, user_type, photo, login_ip, login_date, login_flag, create_time, modify_time, remarks, del_flag, version) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{no}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{mobile}, #{userType}, #{photo}, #{loginIp}, #{loginDate}, #{loginFlag}, now(), now(), #{remarks}, 0, #{version})

INSERT INTO (username, password, no, name, email, phone, mobile, user_type, photo, login_ip, login_date, login_flag, create_time, modify_time, remarks, del_flag, version) VALUES
(#{item.username}, #{item.password}, #{item.no}, #{item.name}, #{item.email}, #{item.phone}, #{item.mobile}, #{item.userType}, #{item.photo}, #{item.loginIp}, #{item.loginDate}, #{item.loginFlag}, now(), now(), #{item.remarks}, 0, #{version})
mapper.select: select a.no from a order by a.no desc limit 1

SELECT
FROM a
JOIN t_sys_user_role ur ON ur.user_id = a.id AND ur.role_id = #{role.id}
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and a.id != 1
AND a.username like CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
AND a.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY a.name
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_sys_user_role WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_sys_user_role (user_id, role_id)
SELECT #{id}, #{role.id} FROM dual
